item.title: How do I fix the issue of a white blank screen showing before MainWindow is loaded
item.description: How do I fix the issue of a white blank screen showing before MainWindow is loaded? I have encountered an issue where our MainWindow displays a completely white screen for 1 to 2 seconds before all components are rendered. Our clients find this white screen unacceptable, so I was tasked with fixing this issue. I googled many keywords and only got one effective scenario: WindowStyle =None, AllowsTransparency =true, Background = new SolidColorBrush(Colors.
